channel.title: YOTA on YOTA Belgium
channel.description: Recent content in YOTA on YOTA Belgium

item.title: We have a new logo!
item.description: Hello, As you may have noticed, we have a new logo for the Belgium YOTA website. The goal of this new logo is to make the website more modern and to make it more appealing to the younger generation. And giving a visual identity to the website.

item.title: YOTA Newsletter May 2024
item.description: You can download the newsletter from the official YOTA Discord server: Click here to join the discord.

item.title: We are live!
item.description: Good afternoon everyone. I’m proud to announce that we have a website for YOTA Belgium. The website is written using HUGO, which allows us to generate website and blog using markdown. Therefore, we do not require any technical knoweldge to submit article.
